tns:patch.author: jdeanquin
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_program_description AS SELECT a.amp_activity_id, btrim(e.body) AS ebody, e.language AS locale FROM amp_activity_version a JOIN dg_editor e ON a.program_description = e.editor_key AND btrim(e.body) != '';;;
